metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3497 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
GStreamer before 1.18.4 might access already-freed memory in error code paths when demuxing certain malformed Matroska files.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3497` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gstreamer1.0-gtk3 - 1.14.5-0ubuntu1~18.04.2
gstreamer1.0-plugins-good - 1.14.5-0ubuntu1~18.04.2
gstreamer1.0-pulseaudio - 1.14.5-0ubuntu1~18.04.2
gstreamer1.0-qt5 - 1.14.5-0ubuntu1~18.04.2
libgstreamer-plugins-good1.0-0 - 1.14.5-0ubuntu1~18.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-good1.0 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.14.5-0ubuntu1~18.04.2').
